attributes.review: This is by far the WORST app I have ever downloaded. At first, I opened the app and I was greeted with a bright orange sun blazing through my screen. Later, I realized it was an enhanced picture of Donald Trump that was blinding me and resulted in my colour blindness. Furthermore, as I attempted to find Trumps qualifications, I found absolutely NOTHING credible on the “presidents” behalf in regards to why he should actually run our country. The app then hacked and BLEW UP my phone (which happened to be brand new). As my love for Trump still resided, I went to the Verizon store and bought a new phone just to redownload the app. Then the app told me I was a fugly s!ut so I deleted it because I have struggled with body image my whole life. Overall -10000/10 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: I got this app to stare at 45 all day and night to pray to but the next day men in black suits showed up and put a bag over my head and knocked me out when I woke up some unknown time after trump, Ben Shapiro, Alex Jones and tucker Carlson  were staring at me chanting covfefe over and over suddenly I had a really shi*tty spray tan and I looked down at my hands and they were tweeting nonsense and terrible things then I looked at my stomach and I was one pound under obese and I felt the sudden urge to sexually assault women and terrorize minority groups suddenly the chanting stopped as trump,Ben Shapiro, Alex Jones and tucker Carlson  said it is done they then shoved me in a closet full of trump clones oh no here they come pls help me...
attributes.title: Help I have a family pls help
